x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: Platform like ServiceNow can help us to debug the code and provide a suggestion. It can also help to connect with fellow developers who are ready help and provide his guidance
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Being a fresher who is starting coding often i come across challenges that needs suggestion to fix issues. getting someone's by side who can review the code and provide a review will help a lot to code and learn faster
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

A solution with focused on identifying the bug in code, proving a suggestion and optimizing the code to learn better and faster will help a lot to keep motivated.

Help of AI to suggest code and debug.

Portal that helps to review the help requested, Onboard member and connect with fellow enthusiast

workflow to streamline the process

AI to assist faster and help in learning 

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

NO

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Collaboration and connect. Virtual connect will definetly help though in-person guidance is always better.
